contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Zhaxi Island''' ({{zh|c=扎西岛|p=zhāxī dǎo}}) is a small island in the middle of [[Lake Basum Tso]] a green salt water lake approximately 300 km east of [[Lhasa]] in the [[Tibet Autonomous Region]] of [[China]]. There are many large stones on Zhaxi Island and each big stone is a symbol of a different [[Bodhisattva]]. == See also == *[[Tashi Dor]] {{coord|30|00|40|N|93|55|01|E|region:CN_type:city_source:kolossus-zhwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Islands of the Tibet Autonomous Region]] [[Category:Lake islands of Asia]] {{Tibet-geo-stub}}
